workflow.name: Generate Instagram posts with AI quotes & images using GPT & Gemini
workflow.description:
# üì∏ Instagram Post Automation Workflow

## ‚ÑπÔ∏è What is this workflow
This workflow automatically produces daily Instagram posts based on a user-provided prompt and sends them to your email inbox.  
Social media creators can use it to generate content periodically and save time.  

The email includes:  
- Picture  
- Title  
- Caption  
- Relevant hashtags  

You can simply copy and paste the content from the email into Instagram, or go further by connecting it to the Facebook API for **full automation**.

## üíº Business Cases
- Generating social media posts primarily for Instagram.  
- Integrating with other workflows (trend research, market studies, news feeds) to produce images, statistics, text, or data comparisons for social media.

## üí∞ Business Value
If you produce daily posts and each Instagram post takes around 1 hour to find a quote, create an image, caption, and hashtags, this workflow does it in less than 1 minute.

This saves you:
* Weekly: 7 hours (1 hour √ó 7 days)
* Monthly: 30 hours (1 hour √ó 30 days)
* Yearly: 360 hours (12 months √ó 30 hours)
At a cost of $20/hour, this workflow saves:
$7,200 annually (360 hours √ó $20).

**In total, you're saving 360 hours + $7,200 per year, allowing you to focus on other valuable activities.**

## ‚öôÔ∏è How Does It Work
1. The workflow runs periodically according to your schedule settings.  
2. Generates a new quote, avoiding duplicates of previously created ones.  
3. Creates an image.  
4. Sends all content by email.

## üîó Integrated Services
- Local file storage on the hosted platform  
- OpenAI GPT model (customizable to any AI model you prefer)  
- Gemini model for image generation (replaceable with your preferred tool)  
- Email sending via SMTP

## üõ† How to Set Up
1. Install the workflow template.  
2. Configure AI models and set up SMTP credentials.  
3. Create a file on your local installation (`/home/node/instagram_posts.txt`).  
4. Set up the scheduler.  
5. Test and enjoy.

parameters.subject: Daily Instagram Post

parameters.prompt: =Draw a simple image for below quote and put the text in the image with bold and clear front and contrast color like red. This is the quote:{{ $('Code-Split-LangChain').item.json.quote}}

parameters.text:
=Create an Instagram post about self-growth and partnership, inspired by Rumi, Khayam, or similar poets. Make sure dont generate these again as previsouly generated:"" {{ $json.post_history }}""

OUTPUT:
No additional text, explanations or title for sections and only provide below information:
1. One short inspirational sentence between 5 to 25 words about self-growth or partnership, including quoting the poet‚Äôs name.
2. A suggested Instagram caption to accompany the post.
3. A list of suitable hashtags.

messageValues.message: you are a self growth and partnership mentor and coach and by giving inspirational quotes you will give insight and guidline to people for beeter life.

parameters.content:
# 2. Quote Generation

* Use Model to generate a new quote
* Split outcome to Quote, Caption and Hashtag for the next step

# 3. Save new Quote

* save new quote to the file for the next run

# 4. Image Generation and Send Email

* Generate Image based on quote
* Send email by attach the generated image and include Quote, Caption and Hashtag

# 1. Initial Stage

* Schedule node is running the workflow periodically based on user configuration
* Next node read all previous generated quotes and convert it to JSON format for the next step to avoid duplicate generation
Update System and User Prompt Based on your needs
Update User Prompt if you need to change the image generation style
